thread.title: QUIZ! Wayne Rooney becomes 17th outfield player to make 450 Premier League appearances - can you name all 17?
thread.title_full: QUIZ! Wayne Rooney becomes 17th outfield player to make 450 Premier League appearances - can you name all 17?

author: Richard Innes
title: QUIZ! Wayne Rooney becomes 17th outfield player to make 450 Premier League appearances - can you name all 17?
text:
The latest addition to this quiz (Photo: Matthew Peters) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
We know EXACTLY how you're going to do in this quiz. 
At first, you'll think it's almost too easy. With Wayne Rooney making his 450th Premier League appearance in Man United's 1-1 draw against Liverpool, there are now 17 outfield players who have reached that landmark. And when you first look at the list below - where you just have to fill in the blanks - you will instantly rattle off a few very obvious names. 
Frankly, if you don't get to a score of 10 pretty quickly, you need to have a serious word with yourself. Well, that one answer you should get (Photo: Mike Hewitt) 
However, things get tougher once the big names are out of the way. A lot tougher. 
To help you out, we've given you the name of the club for which each player made the most Premier League appearances. One other tip: remember this is OUTFIELD players only, so goalkeepers are not included. 
Trust us - after your flying start, you're going to need that assistance. You've only got seven minutes to get all seventeenâ€¦ Like us on Facebook
